label: PageController
cors_middleware
peekOfCode:
def cors_middleware(app: FastAPI):
    app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=["*"],
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"])

label: static_middleware

def static_middleware(app: FastAPI):
    app.mount("/assets", StaticFiles(directory="./app/templates"), name="assets")
